results.name: Least number of knight's moves from (0,0) to (n,1) on infinite chessboard.
comment: Row 2 of the array at A065775.
Apparently a(n)=A162330(n), n>0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 29 2011
program: print([a(n) for n in range(70)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Mar 02 2021
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 20 2010
